titles: The manuell of Epictetus, translated out of Greeke into French, and now into English, conferred with two Latine translations. Herevnto are annexed annotations, and also the apothegs of the same author. By Ia. Sanford
author: Epictetus.
Sandford, James.
publisher: By H. Bynneman for Leonard Maylard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
